refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: return_image = circle(input_image,double center_x,double center_y,int radius,int r_value,int g_value,int b_value,int thickness,int linetype,int shift);

listitem.para: Image matrix(generated after imread where the circle is drawn.
x coordinate of the center of the circle to be drawn.
y coordinate of the center of the circle to be drawn.
Radius of the circle to be drawn.
Amount of r in the colour between 0 and 255.
Amount of g in the colour between 0 and 255.
Amount of b in the colour between 0 and 255.
Thickness of the circle outline, if positive. Negative thickness means that a filled circle is to be drawn.
Type of the circle boundary.Can be 0/8 for 8 line connected, 4 for 4-line connected line.
Number of fractional bits in the coordinates of the center and in the radius value.
returns image matrix with changes applied.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function circle draws a simple or filled circle with a given center , radius and colour on the input image. It returns the input image with circle drawn on it with the same type.
